```{r}
students <- 1000
probability <- rbeta(students, 5, 5)
inteligence <- rnorm(students)
grades <- rnorm(students)
plot(inteligence, grades)
```
Now we supose that the grades are based on the inteligence
```{r}
grades_inteligence <- grades+inteligence
plot(inteligence, grades_inteligence)
```
Now we can simulate some other variables
```{r}
problems <- runif(students)
problems_with_students <- grades_inteligence-problems
plot(inteligence, problems_with_students)
df <- data.frame(inteligence, grades, problems)
```
